assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: ZIGExN Co., Ltd. operates the life media platform in Japan. It operates rejob, a job-transfer/job offering information service site for beauty and healthcare industries; rejob care, a job offering information service site for nursing care/rehabilitation industries; miraxs, a job offering/consulting service site for nursing care; miraxs-sitter, a babysitter introduction service site; and Kensetsu-JOBs, a recruitment business site. The company also offers Realestateworks, a job placement business site for real estate industry; Ties, a job placement business site for manufacturer domain; and Dorapita, a job placement business site for logistics. In addition, it provides smocca, a real estate rental housing information service site; Sekaiproperty, a real estate website; and reshop-navi, an information and price comparison between home renovation companies. Further, the company offers reshop-navi exterior, an information and price comparison between home exterior contractors; enepi, an information and price comparison between propane gas companies; Hikkoshi-EX, an information and price comparison between moving companies; and Gaiheki-concierge, a free matching service site. Additionally, it offers Arubaito-ex, a part-time job offering information service site; Matchingood-Jinzai, a human resource cloud management system; CareerPlus, a business management system; Kyujinjoho.biz, a job offering paper media site; appleworld, an information service site for hotels; TRAVELIST, a simple comparison/booking service site; Chukosha-EX, an information service site for used cars; Kuruma-kaitori-EX, an information service site for vehicle assessments; Kekkon-sodansho-hikaku, an information comparison service site for marriage agencies; Kateikyoshi-kuraberu, an information comparison service site for home tutors; and Ryugaku-kuraberu, an information comparison service site for study abroad agencies. ZIGExN Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
